examples.example: 即使暂时分开，我们也坚信未来一定会再次相聚。

translate.english: Even if we are temporarily separated, we firmly believe that we will definitely meet again in the future.

examples.example: 毕业时同学们虽然分开了，但彼此的友情永远不会消散。

translate.english: When graduating, although the classmates are separated, but the friendship between each other will never dissipate.

examples.example: 无论我们相隔多远、分开多久，心始终紧紧相连。

translate.english: No matter how far apart we are and how long we are apart, our hearts are always closely connected.
